General.Name: Sungchang Autotech Co. Ltd
General.Description: Sungchang Autotech Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automotive parts in South Korea. It offers inverters for electric compressors, cluster ionizers, cabin air filters, and sponges, as well as injection molding products. The company was formerly known as SEUNG CHANG AIRTEK., Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Sungchang Autotech Co., Ltd. in January 2013. Sungchang Autotech Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Anseong, South Korea.
